metadata.name: 2 25OZ EverDry Ultra Dry Antiperspirant 20 g 100g Stick

clinical_particulars.therapeutic_indications: Indicated for use as an antiperspirant

contraindications.disease: Dermal and oral LD50 in rat is 2000 mg kg MSDS
contraindications.pharmacodynamics: Aluminum chlorohydrate serves to reduce excessive sweating by directly blocking the sweat ducts A32413
